name: The Grog Mug O' Death <tm> (dusty) (1h)
data: It has great weapon class for its type (average in general).
It increases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users constitution pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers fast.
It increases damage a good amount.
This weapon will affect the users constitution.
This weapon will affect the users strength.
This weapon does much more damage than normal weapons.
This weapon will increase the users overall power.
